Event Rentals

Your Studio. Your Vision.

Your ideas deserve space to breathe, experiment, and manifest. Your vision deserves an environment that nurtures its development. At The Vincent Atelier, we provide both, creating the conditions where meaningful creative work can thrive.

Rental Packages

From quick sessions to full-day events, our flexible rental packages include key amenities and support—making it easy to focus on what matters: your experience.

₱5,000 | 3 Hours

Perfect for individual artists, photographers, and small creative teams seeking a professional environment for short-term projects. The Creative Studio Session provides access to our meticulously designed studio spaces equipped with essential amenities for productive creative work.

₱15,000 | 6 Hours

Designed for instructors, organizations, and creative professionals conducting workshops, seminars, or educational programming. This package transforms our versatile spaces into optimal learning environments with all necessary teaching amenities.

₱35,000 | 8 Hours

Transform our gallery spaces into the perfect venue for your cultural event, exhibition opening, product launch, or creative gathering. This comprehensive package offers a sophisticated setting with professional amenities for memorable experiences.

₱₱65,000 | 12 Hours

Experience the full potential of The Vincent Atelier with exclusive access to our entire facility, creating a remarkable setting for major events, film productions, or multi-faceted creative projects requiring diverse spaces and comprehensive support.
